Differs from property to property , deposit 150/250pound + 1st installment as we are close to intake 
Termly/ Monthly installments

Do I need a guarantor for me to proceed with the reservation? Do you accept UCL as the guarantor? 

For few properties , if you want to pay in installments you need UK guarantor 
For some properties, International guarantor accepted.

Yes, you need to accept/sign the contract, guarantor part & clear your due payment before move-in
